concept-wr.title: The Routing Scenario
concept-wr.shortdesc: The Routing Scenario implements a Layer 3 test path using two virtual routers.

conbody.p: The Routing Scenario topology is illustrated in the following figure. The test path is shown as a red dotted line.

fig.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Deployment Scenario for Routing

conbody.p: Two end users, user1 and user2, each launch an instance of the example guest image inside a virtual machine, deployed within the domain of corresponding tenants, tenant1 and tenant2. Inside each instance, a user application creates a Layer 3 router configured with IP addresses and static routes.

The network interfaces in the test path use performance-optimized network drivers. You can also use standard Linux virtio drivers with the Layer 3 routing application, but this will yield poorer performance.
